component.description: FileUpload goes beyond the browser input type="file" functionality and features a flash-javascript solution for uploading files. File filtering, multiple uploads, partial page rendering and progress tracking are the significant features compared to legacy fileUploads.
component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element.
update false java.lang.String Client side ids of the component(s) to be updated after file upload completes.
process false java.lang.String
fileUploadListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void fileUploadListener(org.primefaces.event.FileUploadEvent) Method expression to listen file upload events.
multiple false java.lang.Boolean false Allows multi file uploads, turned off by default.
auto false java.lang.Boolean false When set to true, selecting a file starts the upload process implicitly. Default is false.

mode false java.lang.String advanced

cancelLabel false java.lang.String Cancel
